high_descs: Turn to your left and walk towards the dog bed.
Pick up a basketball from the dog bed.
Turn to your right, and walk towards the dresser.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a basketball, turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Grab the basketball on the mat
Turn right, walk to the white cabinet
Turn on the lamp on the cabinet
anns.task_desc: Grab the basketball on the mat, turn on the lamp on the white cabinet

high_descs: Turn around face the dog bed.
Pick up the basketball from the dog bed.
Turn to your right and walk towards the dresser.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while holding a basketball.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bean bag chair
Pick up the basketball that is sitting on the bean bag chair
Turn right and head to the dresser
Turn on the lamp that is on the dresser
anns.task_desc: Examine a basketball under a lamp
